thread.title: Renovations will affect your stay
thread.title_full: Renovations will affect your stay - Review of Radisson Blu Edwardian Hampshire Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Andrea C
title: Renovations will affect your stay
text: We arrived to a building site very noisy and dusty because of the renovations. It was my favourite hotel in London as I have stayed there before. If I had been made aware of the renovations I would have chosen a different hotel. Definitely did not get value for money.
